description: Observations on a proposed development within the adjoining Borough of Wandsworth with respect to the construction and operation of a replacement waste transfer station (measuring 2,277sqm in area, 14.5m high at the ridge and 11.8m high at the eaves), a mess room, office and welfare facility, a weighbridge and weighbridge office building and a water tank and pump house. The extension of the permitted operating hours to allow for 24/7 working is proposed. AnEnvironmental Statement has been submitted with the application under The Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017. [Reconsultation following the submission of a Supplementary Planning and Technical Note on 02/01/19 containing further information relating to transport, air quality, energy and sustainability and noise] at Pensbury Place Transfer Station 661-679 Pensbury Place Battersea SW8 4TP
